mapper.select: select memOrderNum, memOrderDate, purchaseConfirm, reviewConfirm, returnConfirm, o.memOrderSeqNum, productCnt, option1name, option2name, option1value, option2value, p.productImage,p.productPrice, p.productName, p.productNum, d.deliveryStatus from simple.memberOrder as o left join simple.product as p on o.productNum=p.productNum join memdelivery as d on o.memOrderSeqNum=d.memOrderSeqNum where o.memId=#{memId} order by memOrderSeqNum desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};
select count(*) from simple.memberOrder where memId=#{memId};

select memOrderNum, memOrderDate, purchaseConfirm, reviewConfirm, returnConfirm, o.memOrderSeqNum, productCnt, option1Name, option2Name, option1value, option2value, p.productImage, p.productPrice, p.productName, p.productNum, d.deliveryStatus from simple.memberOrder as o left join simple.product as p on o.productNum=p.productNum join simple.memdelivery as d on o.memOrderSeqNum=d.memOrderSeqNum where memOrderNum = #{memOrderNum} order by memOrderSeqNum desc;

mapper.update: update simple.memberOrder set reviewConfirm = '리뷰작성(완)' where memOrderSeqNum = #{memOrderSeqNum};
mapper.select: select COALESCE(max(reviewNum),0)+1 from simple.productReview;
